title: Contract rights of officers
context: [ยง414D-157] Contract rights of officers. (a) The appointment of an officer shall not itself create contract rights. (b) An officer&rsquo;s removal shall not affect the officer&rsquo;s contract rights, if any, with the corporation. An officer&rsquo;s resignation shall not affect the corporation&rsquo;s contract rights, if any, with the officer. [L 2001, c 105, pt of ยง1]
